data.title: Christian (B) II, King of DENMARK & Norway 1513
data.text:
William Fielding, 1st Earl of DENBIGH - Christian (B) II, King of DENMARK & Norway 1513-23, King of Sweden 1520-1

William Fielding, 1st Earl of DENBIGH

Father: Basil FEILDING of Newnham Paddox

Mother: Elizabeth ASTON

Birth: 1561/1590

Partnership with: Susan VILLIERS

Child: Mary FEILDING Birth: 1601/1620

Child: Basil Fielding, 2nd Earl of DENBIGH Birth: ABT 1608

Child: Anne FIELDING Birth: 1608/1632, Second daughter

Child: George Feilding, 1st Earl of DESMOND Birth: ABT 1614

Ancestors of William Fielding, 1st Earl of DENBIGH

/-Basil FIELDING /-William FEILDING | \-Judith (Goodith) WILLINGTON /-Basil FEILDING of Newnham Paddox William Fielding, 1st Earl of DENBIGH | /-Walter ASTON , Knt. of Tixal \-Elizabeth ASTON | /-James LEVESON of Lilleshall \-Elizabeth LEVESON \-Margaret OFFLEY

Descendants of William Fielding, 1st Earl of DENBIGH

1 William Fielding, 1st Earl of DENBIGH =Susan VILLIERS 2 Mary FEILDING =James, 1st Duke of HAMILTON Marriage: 1620 2 Basil Fielding, 2nd Earl of DENBIGH =Elizabeth BOUCHIER Marriage: 8 Jul 1641, Willesden, Middlesex 2 Anne FIELDING =Baptist Noel, 3rd Viscount CAMPDEN Marriage: 25 Dec 1632 3 Three children CAMPDEN 2 George Feilding, 1st Earl of DESMOND =Bridget STANHOPE Marriage: 17 Apr 1630
